h2_title: Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Violet Spider
content: Eventually, the road will crumble, but you'll be saved by that one mysterious spider sister who seems to be on your side. This will take you high above the Webbed Hollow, and onto the mountain trail toward the **Temple of Yellow Flowers**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Violet Spider'.
The content is as follows:
Eventually, the road will crumble, but you'll be saved by that one mysterious spider sister who seems to be on your side. This will take you high above the Webbed Hollow, and onto the mountain trail toward the **Temple of Yellow Flowers**.
